pull.title: scripted-diff: Use generate* from TestFramework
pull.body:
This is needed for #22567.

By using the newly added `generate*` member functions of the test framework, it paves the way to make it easier to implicitly call `sync_all` after block generation to avoid intermittent issues.

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22674](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22674) (validation: mempool validation and submission for packages of 1 child + parents by glozow)
* [#22650](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22650) (Remove -deprecatedrpc=addresses flag and corresponding code/logic by mjdietzx)
* [#22509](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22509) (test: Use MiniWallet in mempool_accept.py by sriramdvt)
* [#22290](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22290) (Package Mempool Submission with Package Fee-Bumping by glozow)
* [#21726](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21726) (Improve Indices on pruned nodes via prune blockers by fjahr)
* [#19888](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19888) (rpc, test: Improve getblockstats for unspendables by fjahr)
* [#17526](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17526) (Add Single Random Draw as an additional coin selection algorithm by achow101)
* [#15129](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15129) (rpc: Added ability to remove watch only addresses by benthecarman)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
I guess I'm the cause of the rebase, will review to move this forward.

verification.payload:
tree 45514e79001bb9e1a3d4f05bdc822e8d18d4012d
parent 245462b66ce35dfc5b191d245b3b18b7d035dc92
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1629385824 +0200
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1630571675 +0200

scripted-diff: Use generate* from TestFramework

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
 sed --regexp-extended -i \
     's/((self\.)?(nodes\[[^]]+\]|[a-z_]*(wallet|node)[0-9a-z_]*))\.(generate(|toaddress|block|todescriptor)(\(|, ))/self.\5\1, /g' \
     $(git grep -l generate ./test | grep -v 'test_framework/' | grep -v 'feature_rbf')
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
